member.name: P:sbrestart.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:sbrestart.main.restartprogram(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Attempts to start the program with the specified arguments Program.End() still needs to be called after!
member.param: The arguments to pass to the started application
member.returns: The session ID of the started application

member.name: M:sbrestart.main.restartprogramasadmin(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Attempts to start the program with the specified arguments with a UAC prompt Program.End() still needs to be called after!
member.param: The arguments to pass to the started application
member.returns: The session ID of the started application
